sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Perl-&perl-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: bash: sh binutils: ar, as, ld, nm bison: bison diffutils: cmp fileutils: chmod, cp, ln, ls, mkdir, mv, rm, touch gcc: gcc grep: egrep, grep groff: nroff gzip: gzip less: less make: make mawk: awk sed: sed sh-utils: basename, date, echo, expr, sleep, tee, test, true, uname textutils: cat, comm, sort, split, tr, uniq, wc
